attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In a Point Based Economy there will be "No Tax / No Interest / No Cash / No Banks. Everything will be based Electronicly on a Points system, a loaf of bread will require for example 20 points. People can earn point by doing work/studying, or as a benefit those whom cant work. People can also recieve points for doing good, like recyling, contributing to the local council.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
